title: Anime Review: One Piece - 491
author: Population Go
description: A critical review of Episode 491 that praises the emotional portrayal of Luffy's pain but criticizes poor facial animations. Rates the episode 3.5 out of 5, calling it a very slow moving but necessary episode.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses events of Episode 491 including Luffy's reaction to Ace's death

title: LUFFY IS FULLY BROKEN... - One Piece Episode 490 + 491 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown
description: A reaction and review video covering Episodes 490 and 491, focusing on Luffy's emotional breakdown after realizing Ace is dead.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains reactions to Luffy's breakdown over Ace's death
